issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] COUNT(*) results in confusing error
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8255](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8255). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
COUNT(\*) is not supported and results in a confusing error. We should implement this support or at least provide an error saying that it isn't supported.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8255?focusedCommentId=17070538) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
Issue resolved by pull request 6755
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/6755>
